item.title: Tweezyscape
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

johno2:

this ISN’T leached… I started editing from a COMPLETLY blank source… NOTHING on it… Ive added specs, ADDED NPC’S!. Noting is edited!, JUST ADDED!! So stfu, you don’t no what your talking about… And ty The Reaper X Im working on a new training zone, VERY large, maybe i should make that the pkbox?

Don’t lie. Rs2dv is the only BLANK source, which uses MySQL and this doesnt. You downloaded a source and edited it horribly. Go away.

So stfu, you don’t no what your talking about… And ty The Reaper X Im working on a new training zone, VERY large, maybe i should make that the pkbox?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 03, 2008, 12:31:46 pm[/size][hr]Im stopping tweezyscape. I can’t be bortherd anymore… And im quitting rs p servers, prob for while, im gona concentrate on hosting any getting my mappping skills (counter strike source, source sdk) pro, (they nearlly there)

So, im gona release tweezyscape to the public!! Hope you enjoy!

item.title: Tweezyscape
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

All leeching is, is when you do simple coding and call it your own work.
-Adding NPC’s
-Changing text
-Adding teleports
-Adding small commands
-Adding objects.
^ Those are how you tell if you leech.
Now, This isn’t rs2dv, so you edited a source. All you did was-
-Add NPC’s
-Changed text
-Add teleports
-Add small commands
-Add objects
What does this equal? Leeching.

Read full topic

item.title: Tweezyscape
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

Hey guys, this is my second post, but this time im gonna show u some pics!! Here are a list of what ive done, and working on.

–Done–

Home.
Train
Kdrag
Jad
Edge (just working on attackable wilderness LOL)
Couple of commands (tele and items)
EMOTION LIST TELES!!! Took me time lolol

–Working on—

Quests,
Shops (simple not like a phat shop or 3rd age :p)
Client
Custom made items o_0

Pics

Home

eu2h4k.jpg761×614

Train

dbsao7.jpg762×614

LOADS OF NPC’s LOLOL, Also have BUNCh drops, Gud ey!!, Also random.

kdrag

spks60.jpg762×614

Just drop addy (t) legs LOL

Jad (just hit a 30 on me )

2hzokle.jpg1024×768

Specs!

2rh421g.jpg762×614

Emotionlist teleports!! Finally got to work!

2r29951.jpg862×662

And finally, edge!!

Please leave comments, and im open to all critisizm (only to help me though ^^)

Thankyou, johno

Commands (list :p)

[code]}
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“Food”) && playerRights >= 1) {
addItem(392, 2000);

        sendMessage("Some Food");

}
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“info”) && playerRights >= 0)
{
newWelc();

sendMessage(“This is the Help Menu”);

}
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“rares”) && playerRights >=3)
{
sendMessage(“Use these wisely!! =]”);
addItem(1037,1);

addItem(1041, 10000);
addItem(1043, 10000);
addItem(1045, 10000);
addItem(1047, 10000);
addItem(1049, 10000);
addItem(1051, 10000);
addItem(1054, 10000);
addItem(1058, 10000);
addItem(1056, 10000);
addItem(963, 10000);
}
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“white”) && playerRights >=1)
{
sendMessage(“Repin’ the white”);
addItem(1037, 1);
addItem(14512, 1);
addItem(14068, 1);
addItem(775, 1);
addItem(14535, 1);
addItem(1837, 1);
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“darmor”) && playerRights >= 1)
{
sendMessage(“You g0tz Dragzor armor!”);
addItem(15195, 1);
addItem(3140, 1);
addItem(4087, 1);
addItem(15352, 1);
}
else if (command.startsWith(“dweps”) && playerRights >= 1)
{
sendMessage(“Enjoy your Drag weapons!”);
addItem(1305, 1);
addItem(1377, 1);
addItem(1434, 1);
addItem(3204, 1);
addItem(4587, 1);

addItem(5730, 1);
addItem(6739, 1);
addItem(7158, 1);

}
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“modwear”) && playerRights >= 1) {
addItem(1048, 1);
addItem(6585, 1);
addItem(14512, 1);
addItem(4151, 1);
addItem(14511, 1);
addItem(1837, 1);
addItem(775, 1);
addItem(3840, 1);
addItem(1052, 1);

        sendMessage("You are given the Legit Mod Wear");

}
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“master”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
addSkillXP(14910000, 0);
addSkillXP(14910000, 1);
addSkillXP(14910000, 2);
addSkillXP(14910000, 3);
addSkillXP(14910000, 4);

addSkillXP(14910000, 21);
addSkillXP(14910000, 22);
addSkillXP(14910000, 23);
sendMessage(""+ playerName +" … you’ve successfuly cheated… noob.");
}
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“adminwear”) && playerRights >= 1) {
addItem(1040, 1);
addItem(6585, 1);
addItem(14512, 1);
addItem(4151, 1);
addItem(14511, 1);
addItem(2914, 1);
addItem(2922, 1);
addItem(3840, 1);
addItem(14086, 1);

        sendMessage("You are given the Legit Admin Wear");

}
if (command.startsWith(“edge”)) {
teleportToX = 3052;
teleportToY = 3512;
}
if (command.startsWith(“jad”)) {
teleportToX = 2396;
teleportToY = 5093;
}

if (command.startsWith(“kdrag”)) {
teleportToX = 2273;
teleportToY = 4695;
}
if (command.startsWith(“train”)) {
teleportToX = 2255;
teleportToY = 3308;
}
if (command.startsWith(“home”)) {
teleportToX = 2526;
teleportToY = 3315;
}
else if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));
if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sendMessage(“That Item Doesn’t Exist”);
}
} catch (Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Wrong syntax! use as ::pickup 00995 10”);
}

	}[/code]

NOTE I HAVE NOW COMPLETLY REDONE THE TRAINING ZONE!! MUCH BETTER. I HAVE ALSO DONE ANOTHER ZONE JUST FOR DEMONS AND DRAGONS!!!
